name: Air's End
description:
Air's End is a short, difficult top-down roguelike. The world's oxygen is beyond limited, and you're one of the few left. Find the key, the exit, and escape to a new timeline.

The project is open source, and can be found here on Github. For a cleaner, "pure" form of the world generator used in the game, please see Miziziziz's ThineCometh on Github.
